meaningMnemonic: When you go on a <radical>scooter</radical>, anything <radical>valuable</radical>, you need to <kanji>leave behind</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: Anything you don't <kanji>leave behind</kanji> will be stolen by <reading>ea</reading>gles (い). Eagles like shiny, valuable things, especially ones that are bouncing around on you while you scoot by on a scooter.
